The claim states that Joe Straus receive: 2. The expert's verdict mentions that right-leaning websites have characterized Joe Straus as pro-choice and in favor of abortion rights.
The SpeakerStraus: com website, run by the Empower Texans Foundation, claims that Straus had a perfect pro-abortion voting record in the two legislative sessions before becoming speaker in 2009.
The authenticity of the claim was verifi: Choice Texas scorecards using the web's Wayback Machine and confirming their authenticity with a NARAL representative. It was found that the 2005 rating for Straus was inaccurate and the 2007 rating could be questionable due to a misreported vote.
